name: Flying Blind
description:
Your ship is hurtling through space and the controls are badly designed.

You can observe threats coming towards you, but must leave your observation post to avoid or destroy them!

You can activate up to 3 different lasers, and manoeuvre the ship using the left or right thruster.

How long will you be able to stay alive?

Developed for GMTK Game Jam 2020 (theme: Out Of Control), using Godot 3.2.2

Made by: 

https://itch.io/profile/jgradim
https://itch.io/profile/leao
